**helix-editor version**
Exact version of the Helix editor you are using.

**helix-ai version**
Exact version of helix-ai you are using.

**Handler**
Which handler are you using? (gemini/openai/copilot/codeium/ollama)

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**helix-ai logs**
helix-ai output logs. Pass `--logFile /path/to/helix-ai.log` to save them.

**helix logs**
Helix editor output logs. Ensure you start helix in verbose mode `hx -v example.file`
